amendment.description: Amendment makes changes to the Energy Employees Occupational Illness Compensation Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 108-499 to make the following changes to Energy Employees Occupational Illness Compensation Program: (1) eliminate the pay cap for physicians and let the market set the rate; (2) eliminate restrictions on hiring authority; (3) eliminate therequirement that an application can only go to Panel if a State agreement is in place, but still authorizes State agreements which Department of Energy will still use for data and information exchanges.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wamp amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
